name: Animalz Party
description:
The game was made for the Spring Jam 2023 by Ryan Laley in about 48h.

The theme was "Connections"

Team :

Arryos - Developer

Kahlan - Developer

Bloth - Music Artist

How to play :

Play with the keyboard and the mouse. You play a lonely crow that wants friend to have a giant party. But you only have one day to convince them all to come !

Pay attention to the music, it evolves as you gain new friends !

Will you find the special ending ?
